title: If the height of a building in URS is more than 25 m
clause_text: If the height of a building in URS is more than 25 m., 6.0 m. wide marginal open space or marginal open space as per the requirement of CFO, whichever is greater, shall be considered.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements â€“
